parameters.name: Immediately
parameters.description: Specifies whether to immediately release the instance. Default value: false. If this parameter is set to false, the instance data is retained for 7 days before it is deleted. If this parameter is set to true, the instance data is deleted immediately.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the instance. Call the [GetLindormInstanceList](~~190281~~) operation to obtain the instance ID.
